drinks.name: Alamo Splash
drinks.directions: Mix with ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Red Hooter
drinks.directions: Pour tequila and amaretto over ice in glass. Fill with pineapple juice, topped with grenadine and topped with a cherry.

drinks.name: Blushin' Russian
drinks.directions: Combine ingredients in blender and blend smoothly. Pour into glass and garnish with chocolate-covered strawberry.

drinks.name: Blue Margarita
drinks.directions: Coat rim of serving glass with lime juice, then dip rim in coarse salt. Pour ingredients over crushed ice, shake, then strain into serving glass.

drinks.name: Cactus Berry
drinks.directions: Shake with crushed ice, pour into salt rimmed glass

drinks.name: Blue Cloud Cocktail
drinks.directions: Combine ingredients in blender and blend smoothly. Pour into glass then top with whipped cream and a strawberry.

drinks.name: Blue Velvet
drinks.directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice and blend smoothly. Pour into glass and top with whipped cream and drizzle with curacao. Top with a cherry

drinks.name: Catalina Margarita
drinks.directions: Shake with crushed ice and pour into salt rimmed glass

drinks.name: Hairy Sunrise
drinks.directions: Mix all ingredients except grenadine in a blender. Pour into glass. Top of with grenadine and a slice of lime.

drinks.name: Beer Buster
drinks.directions: Pour vodka into glass then fill with beer. Add dashed of tabasco sauce then stir lightly.

drinks.name: Black Russian
drinks.directions: Pour over crushed ice into glass.

drinks.name: Bull Frog
drinks.directions: Pour over crushed ice in glass then garnish with a slice of lime.

drinks.name: Cape Codder
drinks.directions: Pour ingredients into glass over crushed ice. Stir vigorously, then garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Alabama Fizz
drinks.directions: Shake all ingredients except soda with crushed ice and strain into glass. Fill with club soda and garnish with 2 sprigs of fresh mint.

drinks.name: Chelsea Sidecar
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Diamond Fizz
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass with 2 ice cubes. Fill with champagne and stir vigorously.

drinks.name: Canyon Quake
drinks.directions: Mix ingredients with crushed ice in blender and blend smoothly. Pour into glass.

drinks.name: Cranberry Cooler
drinks.directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice and blend smoothly. Pour into glass.

drinks.name: Hot Pants
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and pour into salt rimmed glass.

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.directions: Coat rim of glass with lime juice, then coat in salt. Shake ingredients with salt then strain into glass.

drinks.name: Citronella Cooler
drinks.directions: Pour ingredients into glass containing crushed ice. Stir vigorously, then garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Crocodile Cooler
drinks.directions: Pour all ingredients except soda into glass filled with crushed ice. Top with lemon-lime soda and garnish with a cherry/lime wedge.

drinks.name: Desert Sunrise
drinks.directions: Pour ingredients into glass over crushed ice. Top with grenadine.

drinks.name: Electric Jam
drinks.directions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in glass. Top with lemon-lime soda.

drinks.name: Dry Martini
drinks.directions: Mix ingredients and strain into glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel or an olive.

drinks.name: Fallen Angel
drinks.directions: Mix ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Floradora Cooler
drinks.directions: Pour ingredients in glass with crushed glass. Stir vigorously.

drinks.name: Creamy Gin Sour
drinks.directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice. Pour into glass.

drinks.name: Citron Neon
drinks.directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice. Pour into glass. Garnish with lemon wedge and cherry.

drinks.name: Mexican Madras
drinks.directions: Mix ingredients in shaker with ice. Strain into glass and garnish with orange slice.

drinks.name: Purple Pancho
drinks.directions: Mix ingredient and pour into salt-rimmed glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Handball Cooler
drinks.directions: Pour vodka over ice in glass. Fill almost to top with club soda then top with orange juice. Stir vigorously and garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Harvey Wallbanger
drinks.directions: Pour vodka and orange juice over ice into glass. Top with galliano.

drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea
drinks.directions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in glass. Top with cola and garnish with lemon slice.

drinks.name: Pink Lemonade
drinks.directions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in glass. Garnish with lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Fog Horn
drinks.directions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in glass. Top with ginger ale and stir. Garnish with a slice of lime.

drinks.name: Gin and sin
drinks.directions: Shake with crushed ice and strain in glass.

drinks.name: Rum Runner
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain in salt-rimmed glass over ice cubes.

drinks.name: Frozen Daiquiri
drinks.directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice. Pour in glass and garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Frozen Fuzzy
drinks.directions: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice. Pour into glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Silk Stockings
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice. Strain in glass the sprinkle with cinnamon.

drinks.name: Tijuana Taxi
drinks.directions: Pour tequila, curacao and schnapps over crushed ice in glass. Top with lemon-lime soda and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: Affair
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain to glass.

drinks.name: B-52
drinks.directions: Pour carefully each ingredients into glass.

drinks.name: Between The Sheets
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Buzzard's Breath
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: C. C. Kazi
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Galactic Ale
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Green Demon
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Johnny Beach
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Kamikaze
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Lemon Drop
drinks.directions: Shake vodka with crushed ice and strain into glass. Dip each side of lemon wedge in sugar. Shoot vodka and bite into lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Parisian Blonde
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Purple Hooter
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into chilled glass.

drinks.name: Rocky Mountain
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Sex On The Beach
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass. Top with cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Sour Apple
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Woo Woo
drinks.directions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and strain into glass.
